title: BLDC Controller with FOC
problem: Need for efficient BLDC motor control with integrated telemetry.
solution: FOC controller with protections and telemetry, ISR-optimized.
impact: Improved efficiency and torque/speed control; telemetry available.
summary: Development of a BLDC motor controller using Field Oriented Control (FOC).
short_summary: FOC BLDC controller with low-latency telemetry.
highlights: Efficient FOC for torque and speed control.
